location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 3939/46 'Supply of consular flags to HM Consul, Zahidan'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to the supply of consular flags to HM Consul, Zahidan. The main correspondents are: the Under-Secretary of State, India Office; the Foreign Office and the Under Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs on behalf of the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.
